reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nice location, near tube stop and services. Basic hotel, has lift at least, room small. Ok breakfast, cant complain for the price.
reviews.title: Value for money but average

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed at this hotle for 11 days between April and May 2007. I will list our likes and dislikes and you can make your own decision on this property.
reviews.title: Good but a few concerns

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Good budget choice

reviews.text: Cost - This hotel is great for the budget traveller. We paid 65 euro a night
reviews.title: Rude staff
ok for the money
reviews.text: Location - Located just down the block from the Republic metro station we were only minutes from anywhere in paris. There are a variety of restaurants in the area as well as a grocery store a block away.

We stayed a total of 4 nights in this hotel (divided in two stays). The room was small but the bed was ok. The private bathroom was also small but very clean. There was a problem because it had this type of shower you can take and move around you, but it had no place to put it so you would be all the time bathing with one hand busy holding it. The room was quite thanks for the double windows. The heating facilities were ok.
reviews.title: Great location!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location was unbeatable if you want to move around by subway and pay little price (Champs Elysees would have been better, but it was not an option for our budget). Republique is a node for transportation of all kind, it's very near of Gare du Nord and Gare du l'Est. There are plenty of bars, restaurants and supermarkets nearby. All the area around the hotel is very lively, even at 4.30 in the morning on a sunday!
reviews.title: Great location

reviews.text: The staff was ok, nothing to say about them.
reviews.title: lovely!

reviews.text: We paid 64 euros per night without breakfast, which costs 6 euros and in my opinion you can just take it outside the hotel.
reviews.title: This must be the best budget hotel in Paris

likes.liked: — Big room, firm mattress, spotless bathroom

reviews.text: easy to find and really close to all we needed - public transportation, internet cafe, a few bars - and clean. room was a good size, bed was fine, shower curtain a little flimsy (and almost got electrocuted b/c of all the water on the floor), but the front desk help was AWESOME. they gave us great directions to whatever we wanted to find. great price, great location - would definately go back.
reviews.title: Agree with all the previous reviews
